message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100? That's the highest I can go.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $115. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105? That's the highest I can go.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $112. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product at this price.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $112. Would you be willing to meet me at $105? That's the final offer I can make.

I understand you're trying to make a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $105. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $109. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product at this price.
I'm really sorry, but I've reached my limit. I can't go any higher than $100. I'm afraid I'll have to pass on this offer.
